title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: When attempting to copy a package, the destination shown is incorrect. This issue occurs in the 'Copy Package' feature of the 'jdt.ui' component. Steps to reproduce: 1. Open 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' in jdt.ui. 2. Select 'xxx' as the destination.
OB: The incorrect destination is shown as '2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR: 1. Open 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' in jdt.ui. 2. Select 'xxx' as the destination. Verify that the correct destination is shown as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
